schemaDescription: monthsToAnalyze: integer: Number of months to analyze for decline (default: 6)
minDeclineRate: number: Minimum overall decline rate to include in results (default: 0.05 or 5%)
maxDeclineRate: number: Maximum overall decline rate to include in results (default: 0.5 or 50%)
limit: integer: Maximum number of wells to return (default: 1000)
metadata.actionSignature: query/args: 'datasource: OilGasDataSource, monthsToAnalyze: int=6, minDeclineRate: float=0.05, maxDeclineRate: float=0.5, limit: int=1000'
